record.name: Update Related Incident Count for Problem

rule.ruleJSON: {"type":"JSValidate","script":"returnCode = 0;\u000avar $ = lib.c.$;\u000avar file = vars.$L_file;\u000avar oldfile = vars.$L_file_save;\u000avar env = vars.$G_rc_global_environment;\u000avar notification_threshold = env[\"notification.threshold\"];\u000avar inc_count_threshold = env[\"inc.count.threshold\"];\u000aif (!$(\"#dataService\").updateWithoutTrigger(file)) {\u000a returnCode = 1;\u000a} else {\u000a if (inc_count_threshold <= file[\"incident.count\"]) {\u000a $.callrad(\"us.notify\", {\u000a \"name\": notification_threshold,\u000a \"record\": file,\u000a \"second.file\": oldfile\u000a });\u000a }\u000a}"}
